title: ICE: clippy: cannot relate region: ReErased, `-Wclippy::needless_pass_by_value`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Code: `tests/ui/associated-type-bounds/enum-bounds.rs`

````rust
// run-pass

#![feature(associated_type_bounds)]
#![allow(dead_code)]

trait Tr1 { type As1; }
trait Tr2 { type As2; }

impl Tr1 for &str { type As1 = bool; }
impl Tr2 for bool { type As2 = u8; }

enum _En7<'a, 'b, T> // `<T::As1 as Tr2>::As2: 'a` is implied.
where
    T: Tr1<As1: Tr2>,
{
    V0(&'a T),
    V1(&'b <T::As1 as Tr2>::As2),
}

fn _make_en7<'a, 'b, T>(x: _En7<'a, 'b, T>)
where
    T: Tr1<As1: Tr2>,
{
    match x {
        _En7::V0(x) => {
            let _: &'a T = &x;
        },
        _ => {},
    }
}

fn main() {}
````

exec: `clippy-driver enum-bounds.rs -Wclippy::needless_pass_by_value`


This crashes since 94a300b9b8eb253c1b809fc44b8c213fd591c537 cc @compiler-errors 

backtrace:

